mapper.select: SELECT /* adminLogin.acasysLogin */ ADMIN_NO , ADMIN_ID , ADMIN_PW FROM TB_LOGIN_ADMIN WHERE ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} AND ADMIN_PW = #{adminPw}
SELECT /* acasysStudentList.studentCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO WHERE STUDENT_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* acasysStudentList.selectAcasysStudentList */ CAST(a.STUDENT_NO AS UNSIGNED) AS STUDENT_NO , a.STUDENT_NAME , a.STUDENT_AGE , a.STUDENT_MIDDLE_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_HIGH_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD , b.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_NM , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD , c.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_NM , a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD , d.CD_NM AS STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_NM , a.STUDENT_POST_CD , a.STUDENT_ADD , a.STUDENT_ADD_DETAIL , a.STUDENT_PHONE , a.STUDENT_NOTE , a.STUDENT_DEL_YN FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) b ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD = b.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) c ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD = c.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) d ON a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD = d.CD WHERE a.STUDENT_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY STUDENT_NO DESC
SELECT /* acasysStudentList.studentSearchCount */ COUNT(*) FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO WHERE STUDENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studenNmSearch}, '%') AND STUDENT_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* acasysStudentList.acasysStudetnListSearch */ CAST(a.STUDENT_NO AS UNSIGNED) AS STUDENT_NO , a.STUDENT_NAME , a.STUDENT_AGE , a.STUDENT_MIDDLE_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_HIGH_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD , b.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_NM , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD , c.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_NM , a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD , d.CD_NM AS STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_NM , a.STUDENT_POST_CD , a.STUDENT_ADD , a.STUDENT_ADD_DETAIL , a.STUDENT_PHONE , a.STUDENT_NOTE , a.STUDENT_DEL_YN FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) b ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD = b.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) c ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD = c.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) d ON a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD = d.CD WHERE a.STUDENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{studenNmSearch}, '%') AND a.STUDENT_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY STUDENT_NO DESC

SELECT /* acasysStudentList.acasysStudentScoreSearch */ CAST(A.STUDENT_NO AS UNSIGNED) AS STUDENT_NO , (SELECT b.STUDENT_NAME FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO b WHERE b.STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo}) AS STUDENT_NAME , A.SCORE_NO , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.TERM_CD , A.KOREAN , A.MATH , A.ENGLISH , A.SOCIETY , A.SCIENCE , A.HISTORY FROM TB_STUDENT_SCORE A WHERE A.STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo} ORDER BY START_DATE

SELECT /* acasysStudentDetail.acasysStudentDetail */ CAST(a.STUDENT_NO AS UNSIGNED) AS STUDENT_NO , a.STUDENT_NAME , a.STUDENT_AGE , a.STUDENT_MIDDLE_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_HIGH_SCHOOL , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD , b.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_NM , a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD , c.CD_NM AS STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_NM , a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD , d.CD_NM AS STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_NM , a.STUDENT_POST_CD , a.STUDENT_ADD , a.STUDENT_ADD_DETAIL , a.STUDENT_PHONE , a.STUDENT_NOTE , a.STUDENT_DEL_YN FROM TB_STUDENT_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) b ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_GUBUN_CD = b.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) c ON a.STUDENT_SCHOOL_MAJOR_CD = c.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COMN_CD) d ON a.STUDENT_TIER_STATUS_CD = d.CD WHERE a.STUDENT_DEL_YN = 'N' AND a.STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo} ORDER BY STUDENT_NO DESC
